text: Yang Kyung-won (born 1981) is a South Korean actor and model. He is best known for his roles in Crash Landing on You, Arthdal Chronicles Part 1: The Children of Prophecy and Hi Bye, Mama!. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
